text: Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje wao chigakawe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
